text: A Military Base in Hell (Persian : Paygah-e jahannami) is an Iranian film by the director Akbar Sadeghi. Sadeghi also scripted the film. It was released in 1984, and is an early example of Sacred Defense Cinema, i.e. cinema about the Iran Iraq war. Among others, it starred Faramarz Gharibian, Jamshid Hashempur and Zackaria Hashemi.IMDb ==References== category:Iranian films Category:Iran–Iraq War films Category:Persian-language films Category:Iranian war films Category:1984 films
